query:
SELECT 
  lps.pageId,
  lps.angleId,
  ma.name as marketing_angle_name,
  lps.colorScheme,
  lps.ctaButtonId,
  cb.primaryText as cta_primary_text
FROM landing_page_settings lps
LEFT JOIN marketing_angles ma ON lps.angleId = ma.id
LEFT JOIN cta_buttons cb ON lps.ctaButtonId = cb.id
WHERE lps.pageId = 'black-friday';
